snippet: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner and her allies lashed out at Alberto Nisman, who was found dead in his home, questioning whether he had allied himself with forces seeking to weaken her government.
abstract: Argentina's Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner and her allies criticize dead prosecutor Alberto Nisman, who was heading probe into 1994 bombing of Jewish community center; they question whether he had joined efforts to weaken her government.

byline.original: By JONATHAN GILBERT and SIMON ROMERO
byline.contributor: Jonathan Gilbert reported from Buenos Aires, and Simon Romero from Rio de Janeiro.

lead_paragraph: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner and her allies lashed out at Alberto Nisman, who was found dead in his home, questioning whether he had allied himself with forces seeking to weaken her government.
